name: D4: Dark Dreams Don't Die - Season 1: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Deluxe Edition of D4: Dark Dreams Don't Die - Season 1 includes the Base Game and all of the following:

- D4: Special Costume Set (12 Beers) DLC
- D4: Special Art Book
- D4: Season One Voice Over Script
- D4: Mini Soundtrack

name: D4p4m1ne
summary: D4P4M1NE is a clicker game, in which you click a colorful button! In D4P4M1NE you click the colorful button to gain the "feel-good" hormone!

name: D4DJ Groovy Mix
summary:
"D4 FES", a DJ festival that is the stuff of legends.
Inspired by this festival, Japan too experiences a new dawn in DJ culture.
As DJs becomes the main method for people to experience music,
performers called "DJ Units" have begun to appear.
As a culture that can be enjoyed by anyone, young or old, DJing has become an indispensable music genre.

name: D4: Dark Dreams Don't Die - Season 1
summary: A time traveling detective has to solve his wife’s murder before he can prevent it. Use his supernatural ability to “dive” into the world of the living past by touching artifacts called “mementos” to find out the truth behind his wife’s death.

name: D4 Complete Edition
summary: D4 Complete Edition is a bundle on steam that gives you the first complete season along with all the DLC's.
